column6: "EVOLUTION," PART 2 It's time for round two between Wolverine and Sabretooth -- at thirty thousand feet.  As Logan and Creed continue to up the ante on their latest death match, a third party lurks outside the ring.
column8: | penciller (cover):Simone Bianchi | writer:Jeph Loeb | colorist:Paul Mounts | letterer:Richard Starkings
